description: Scale ca. 1:25,000. Shows rivers, mountains, towns, and roads in Mengjin Xian, Henan Province. Cover title. Manuscript on silk. Labels pasted on to show physical features. Oriented with north to the bottom. Pictorial map. Relief shown pictorially. Hummel purchase 1934, no. 26. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Includes text. Previous call number: G7823.M4C3 1767 .M4 Vault Shelf AACR2: 700/1

medium: col. map 90 x 90 cm. fold. in cover 32 x 16 cm.
notes: Shows rivers, mountains, towns, and roads in Mengjin Xian, Henan Province.
